name: Blink
desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

name: Overload
desc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

name: Flaming Lasso
desc: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Earthshock
desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

name: Flesh Heap
desc: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

name: Slithereen Crush
desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

name: Reincarnation
desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Pulse Nova
desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

name: Dual Breath
desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

name: Kraken Shell
desc:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
